entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level rising to 700 metres this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:52 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
